title: Thunderbird freezes/hangs (Mac)
content: Thunderbird freezes/hangs on restart (mac OS 15.4), including in safe mode. I've updated to 137.0.2 from 129 and the same problem occurs. It only displays "Looking up gmail.com" and I get the spinning disk of doom and have to do a force quitâ€¦
creator: james.d.gifford
